definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">1) so that there is no sound and particles of death at death2) just in case for the right click procedure</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">GT</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health"><value name="entity"><block type="entity_set_health"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">~5 seconds (1-0.01, 0.99-0.01, 0.98-0.01...)</comment><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="health"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_health"><value name="entity"><block
